Middle.description:
You stand at the center of the arena. The air is tense, and all sections surround you. 
 There is a large cornucopia nearby, full of useful supplies

items.name: Medicine Vial
items.description: A plastic container filled with medicine

items.name: Tracker Jacker Repellent
items.description: A strong-smelling substance to keep bugs away.

items.name: Raft
items.description: A wooden raft to keep you afloat.

items.name: Matches
items.description: Could be useful to keep you warm.

Section1.description: You are in Section 1. Mist rises from the swampy ground.

items.name: Swamp Stick
items.description: A soggy stick that might be useful.

Section2.description: You are in Section 2. The air smells of smoke. Trees are burning here.

Section3.description: You are in Section 3. Lightning strikes in the distance.

items.name: Lightning Stone
items.description: A rock charged by a lightning bolt.

Section4.description: You are in Section 4. The ground is cracked and dry. It's hot here.

items.name: Dried Fruit
items.description: A small piece of fruit, dried by the heat.

Section5.description: You are in Section 5. A large body of water blocks your path.

Section6.description: You are in Section 6. Bees buzz loudly. Watch out!

Section7.description: You are in Section 7. Thick fog surrounds you. Visibility is low.

items.name: Flashlight
items.description: A small flashlight with low battery.

Section8.description: You are in Section 8. The forest is quiet, too quiet...

items.name: Camouflage Cloth
items.description: Helps you blend in with trees.

Section9.description: You are in Section 9. You hear distant cannon shots.

items.name: Tribute Token
items.description: A small metal token dropped by a fallen tribute.

Section10.description: You are in Section 10. A field of strange flowers surrounds you.

items.name: Sleep Flower
items.description: Smells sweet but may be dangerous.

Section11.description: You are in Section 11. The trees here are filled with tracker jackers.

items.name: Tracker Jacker Repellent
items.description: A strong-smelling substance to keep bugs away.

Section12.description: You are in Section 12. You see ruins of an old building.

items.name: Broken Map
items.description: A torn piece of a map showing part of the arena.
